section_title: 10d01Â  - Employees of the Library of Congress.
text:
Pursuant to Sec 4(f) of the amended Act, the Secretary is
authorized to enter into an agreement with the Librarian of Congress for
enforcement of the FLSA with respect to any individual employed in the Library
of Congress. An agreement is now in effect which provides that the Library of
Congress will investigate its own complaints.
html: Pursuant to Sec 4(f) of the amended Act, the Secretary is authorized to enter into an agreement with the Librarian of Congress for enforcement of the FLSA with respect to any individual employed in the Library of Congress. An agreement is now in effect which provides that the Library of Congress will investigate its own complaints.
